questions.question: Which is of the following statements about feudalism is NOT true?

choices.answer: Kings had the most power
Knights offered protection
Peasants worked on self sufficient manors
Peasants who worked hard became knights
Wars fought between Christians, Jews & Muslims
A series of wars between religions to gain control of the holy land
A war between European Christians & the Mongol Empire
A series of wars fought to remove Muslim Turks from Europe

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT a cause of the Crusades?

choices.answer: Desire to control the Holy Land
Pope seeks to increase power
European knights seek riches, land, and power
Europeans desire to trade with Asia

questions.question: How did the Crusades change Europe?

choices.answer: Europe became more isolated
Europeans converted to different religions
Europeans were introduced to new products and ideas
Europe created the Silk Road

questions.question: How did increased trade affect the feudal system?

choices.answer: It made the feudal system stronger
Population decreased
Travel became safer
Fewer harvests

questions.question: Why were Europeans interested in going East to Asia?

choices.answer: To get products they couldn't get in Europe
To colonize Asia
To convert Asians to Christianity
They wanted to find a way to the Americas

questions.question: Which of these was a reason why Europeans wanted to reach Asia by sea?

choices.answer: The Silk Road didn't exist yet
The Silk Road was closed
The Silk Road became more dangerous
The Silk Road was safer

questions.question: In the 1400s, Prince Henry the Navigator opened a school of navigation in Portugal.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Who was the first European to reach Asia by sea?

choices.answer: Vasco de Gama
Bartolomeu Dias
Vasco Nunez de Balbao
Ferdinand Magellan

questions.question: How did Columbus's plan to reach Asia differ from others?

choices.answer: Most other explorers thought the world was flat
Columbus thought it was quicker to go around Africa
Columbus wanted to sail East to reach Asia.
Columbus wanted to sail west to reach Asia

questions.question: Which of the following was one of Columbus's big mistakes?

choices.answer: The world was bigger than Columbus thought
North and South America were smaller than Columbus thought
The world was smaller than Columbus thought
There were more pirates roaming the seas than Columbus thought

questions.question: Which of these was NOT a result of Columbus reaching the Americas?

choices.answer: Interaction between Europe & the Americas
Europeans were no longer interested in finding a way to Asia
Conflict between European countries
Other explorers were inspired to sail across the Atlantic

questions.question: Corn, potatoes, and other crops from the Americas caused the population of Europe to increase

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Native Americans had horses before the Europeans arrived?

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Which of the following was a result of the Columbian exchange?

choices.answer: Millions of Europeans died as a result of Native American diseases
Native American population increased due to more food from Europe
Native Americans were paid to work the land
Europeans brought Africans to work as slaves
